frameDefinitions: The Connector is an artifact created to affix a Connected_item or to bind onto a Fixed_location and is primarily so used.
Words in the frame refer to any Document that has a legal status or conventional social significance.
This frame contains words that describe specific aspects of a Color.
The Fastener is an artifact created to close a Container (e.g. coat, jar).
A condition that is set out in an Agreement imposes Requirements on a Party or parties, with respect to some Regulated_entity.

This frame covers a step in a criminal process in which a  Judge decides whether the Accused should be released on bail, and, if so, what the amount of the bail should be.  '' 'Thorsen, of Grimstad, Norway, was granted $100,000 bail until June 18.'
frameExamples: A waterproof <t>adhesive</t> should be used for this exterior job.
They got their marriage <t>licence</t> from Canada.
The door <t>seal</t> prevented air from getting in and the kids' screams from getting out.
Breach of contract occurs where one of the parties fails to perform any one of the contract <t>terms</t> .
Thorsen, of Grimstad, Norway, was granted $100,000 <t>bail</t> until June 18.
listRoleDefinitions: <fen>Connector</fen> identifies the entity or substance that forms the bond that maintains the <fen>Item</fen> in a fixed position; it is usually expressed in a 'with'-PP.
The holder of the document.
The authority that issues the document.
Obligation is the obligation that is imposed on the <fen>Bearer</fen> of the <fen>Document</fen>.
Right is the right of the <fen>Bearer</fen> of the <fen>Document</fen>  that is authorized by the <fen>Document</fen>.
Status is the state of the Bearer of the Document indicated by the Document.
Document is the piece of paper that has the legal status.
The color that is being described.
The entity whose <fen>Color</fen> is being described.
This role identifies the item that is closed with the <fen>Fastener</fen>.
The artifact created to close a <fen>Container</fen>.
This role identifies the active zone of the container where the <fen>Fastener</fen> is located.
A mutual commitment to an obligation made by two or more parties.
A salient entity, an activity or behavior by the parties to the agreement to which a particular stipulation pertains.
The <fen>Requirements</fen> that a particular stipulation of the <fen>Agreement</fen> imposes on one or both of the parties.
An event or state of affairs that is desirable to some or all of the parties to the <fen>Agreement</fen> and which is conditional on the <fen>Requirements</fen> being met.
A party who demands that certain <fen>Requirements</fen> be met before they will enter into an <fen>Agreement</fen> or allow a <fen>Desired_state_of_affairs</fen> to be realized.
At the time of bail setting, the <fen>Accused</fen> is held without bail/bond, released on his/her own recognizance, or required to give the Court  a specific amount of money for bail.
The <fen>Judge</fen>, as head of  the Court, determines the <fen>Accused</fen>'s bail.
<fen>Status</fen> idenitifies the decision made with regard to bail.  The possible statuses are 'without bail/bond', 'on one's own recognizance', or a specific amount of money required for bail.
This role identifies the <fen>Time</fen> when the bail setting occurs.
This role identifies the <fen>Place</fen> where the bail setting occurs.
listRoleExamples: The robber tied Harry to the chair with a <fex><t>rope</t></fex>.
<fex>My </fex> visa will expire next month.
<fex>US consulate</fex> issued a Visa to Ms. Yang to travel to San Francisco.
They were all under subpoena <fex>to appear in court.</fex>
Raymond has a <fex>fishing</fex> licence.
The couple just got their <fex>marriage</fex> certificate.
The police need a search <fex><t>warrant</t></fex> to enter his house.
I love really pale <fex>yellows</fex>.
Fornalutx is a jewel of warm <fex>stone</fex>.
On Friday night, many men will simply elect to remove their tie and unbutton their top <fex>shirt</fex> button.
Man, I have just bought the exact same belt <fex><t>buckle</t></fex> and it won't open.
We couldn't close the <fex>tent flap</fex> zipper and a lot of flies came in .
The right to remove tenants ' fixtures may be given by the terms <fex>of the lease</fex>.
Many believed that the <fex>military</fex> terms of the armistice made the resumption of hostilities virtually impossible for Germany.
Each time you use the site, a condition of use is <fex>that you comply with the above terms</fex>.
What are your conditions <fex>of Sale</fex>?
<fex>Our</fex> political and military terms of peace will be designed to prevent a repetition of Germany's misdeeds
Judge Duncan fixed <fex>the doctor's</fex> bail at one million dollars.
<fex>Judge Duncan</fex> fixed the doctor's bail at one million dollars.
Judge Duncan fixed the doctor's bail <fex>at one million dollars</fex>.
